Trigger You enter @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

Requirements You are wielding a single melee weapon

You imbue your strikes with the very foundational aether of your iaijutsus. When you enter Iai Stance, you may choose to enter Offensive Iai Stance instead. While in this stance, you suffer a -2 status penalty to your AC, but all of your strikes made with the agile trait are made with a -3 penalty for the second attack and a -6 penalty for the third (instead of -4 and -8 respectively).

If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.teQAV9Y2BfebRBP3]{Agile Iai Stance} feat, once per day you may combine blend the two stances together and enter both Agile Iai Stance and Offensive Iai Stance.
